segments.text: Miss Fallen , can you tell me why you want to get a visa to the States ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To study . I am going to the University of Tampa to do a postgraduate course for three years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And do you have the Letter of Acceptance from the University with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much . And do you have any proof of the financial support for the three years ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've got a letter from my bank here . It shows I am able to support myself during these three years of studies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks very much . Well , I'll be able to give you a visa for one year , a student visa , that is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , but mine is a three-year program .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is a three-year , but you can renew the visa each year in the States . It is our usual procedure .
segments.speaker: S1
